channel.title: How to give a sword a 2h stance on a 317
channel.description: how do you give a sword a 2h stance?

item.title: How to give a sword a 2h stance on a 317
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

easy go to client.java and search for int[] two_hand = and add the wep id to the list. also ther are a few more spots in client.java that u need to add the id. ok to find thoes other places find the rune 2h id mine is (1319) now you will see something that looks like this:

		if(id == 6609 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313 || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 7158) 
			if(FightType != 3) {
		{
	return 308;
	}

add your wep here

		if(id == 6609 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313 || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 7158) 
			if(FightType == 3) {
		{
	return 3496;
	}

add here aswell

if(id == 6609 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313 || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 7158)  
{
return 306;
}

and here

if(id == 6609 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313 || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 7158)  
{
return 307;
}

and keep adding to the lists u find.

Happy Posting!

Brandon

Read full topic
